title: Provides a program fee option for graduate students to allow continued access to certain facilities within the state university
summary: Provides a program fee option to allow graduate students who have taken at least 30 credits towards the completion of a degree to maintain access to certain facilities within the state university in order to continue a research project or to pursue other academic requirements.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing a program fee option for graduate students
